It may be easier to use `Nat.leRecOn` to construct this map.

Thanks for the suggestion. I had already tried to make an induction on the `le` type, but it seems it was not possible (because this may eliminate only into props). I could not use `Nat.leRecOn` either, but I have managed to do an induction on the numbers that are involved, which gives good defeq.
